mapper.select: select count(*) from trip where part='festival' and endday>=#{day} and beginday <= #{day}
mapper.update: update trip set readcount=readcount+1 where tnum=#{tnum}
mapper.select: select * from trip order by readcount desc
select * from trip where region=#{region} order by readcount desc
select * from trip where theme=#{theme} order by readcount desc
select title from trip where tnum=#{tnum}
select * from trip order by tnum desc
select * from trip where part=${part} order by tnum desc
select * from trip where title like CONCAT('%',#{searchtext},'%')
select * from trip where part=#{part} and region=#{region} order by readcount desc

SELECT t.tnum,t.title,t.intro,t.location,t.image,count(r.tnum) as reviewcount,ifnull(avg(r.rstar),0) as avgrstar FROM trip t left outer JOIN review r on r.tnum=t.tnum where t.part='trip' and region=#{region} group by tnum order by t.readcount desc
